original_definition: 'status display' means a display used to show simple but changing information such as selected channel, time or power consumption. A simple light indicator is not considered a status display;
generated_definition: 'status display' means a visual representation of a product's current state, typically displayed on a user interface to provide real-time information about its availability, progress, or performance.

Article 2: ‘status display’ means a display used to show simple but changing information such as selected channel, time or power consumption. A simple light indicator is not considered a status display;
